meanings.definition: The act of imparting or adding a pleasant fragrance to something.
meanings.sent1: The aromatizations of the flowers filled the room with a sweet smell.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the aromatizations of vanilla in her baking.
meanings.sent3: The aromatizations of the perfume made everyone sneeze in the office.
meanings.sent4: The aromatizations of the scented candles transformed the atmosphere into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent5: The aromatizations of fresh herbs in the kitchen made cooking a delightful experience.

meanings.definition: The process of converting a substance into an aromatic form.
meanings.sent1: During the aromatizations of the oils, they gained a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent2: The aromatizations of the herbs enhanced the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The aromatizations of the room spray turned the office into a fragrant garden.
meanings.sent4: The aromatizations of the incense filled the room with a mystical aroma.
meanings.sent5: The aromatizations of the spices in the curry created a tantalizing smell.
